data.text: Luzitisa Yave !
Yave weti tunga Yelusalemi,
Niandi weti belusa mintima mi kosakana
Niandi weti zenga thalu yi zimbuetete
Pfumu eto widi wunneni
Yave weti kindisa woso mutu weti kukikululanga
Luyimbidila Yave mu kumvutudilanga matondo ;
Niandi wufukidilanga diyilu mu matuti ;
Niandi wumvananga bidia kuidi bibulu bi fioti
Khini andi yisi ko mu zingolo zi phunda
Yave weti yangalala mu batu bobo beti kunkinzika,
Yayisa Yave, a Yelusalemi ;
bila niandi wunkindisanga zitunga zi mielo miaku ;
Niandi wuntulanga ndembama mu zindilu ziaku
Niandi wumfidisanga zithumunu ziandi ku ntoto ;
Niandi wumvananga mvula yi matadi banga mika mi dimemi ;
Niandi wunlonzanga mvulꞌandi yi matadi banga matadi ma fioti
Weti fidisa mambu mandi ayi weti kumasiutisa ;
Niandi wuzabikisa mambu mandi kuidi Yakobi ;
Kasia bu vangila kadi kuidi dikanda dinkaka ko
